summary: Add Ulfric\'s Clothes to your game but under a different name. Now named Thane\'s Clothes, Thane\'s Boots and Thane\'s Bracers, you can wear the set on your own character. It also adds a light armor version on par with the Stormcloak Officer armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=gray][size=10][b]Thane\'s Clothes[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/6361-1-1326751970.jpg[/img]

This mod adds a renamed version of [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Ulfric%27s_Clothes]Ulfric\'s Clothes[/url] to the game. Your character will be at the height of fashion in all the Jarls\' courts.

It also adds a light armor version, on par with the Stormcloak Officer Armor, Boots and Bracers.

[u]Features[/u]

- Thane\'s Boots
- Thane\'s Bracers
- Thane\'s Clothes

- Thane\'s Armor (Light Armor)
- Thane\'s Armored Boots (Light Armor)
- Thane\'s Armored Bracers (Light Armor)

- Craftable at a forge

[u]Updates[/u]

- [color=green]Version 0.4 (Now Craftable At A Forge)[/color]
- [color=brown]Version 0.3 (Added Light Armor Version)[/color]
- Version 0.2 (Typo Correction)
- Version 0.1 (Initial Release)

[u]Install[/u]

Use the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url]

Or extract to your Data folder and enable the plugin through the launcher.

[u]Use[/u]

You can craft the items at any forge.

[u]Uninstall[/u]

Disable it in the Nexus Mod Manager.

Or delete the file from your Data folder.
author: Quicksilverk
